mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRUDCATE(crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible) VALUES(CRUDCATE_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{namesub}, #{namesubsub}, 0, sysdate, #{seqno}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible FROM crudcate ORDER BY crudcateno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE crudcate SET visible='Y' WHERE crudcateno = #{crudcateno}
UPDATE crudcate SET visible='N' WHERE crudcateno = #{crudcateno}
mapper.select: SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible FROM crudcate WHERE name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT name FROM crudcate ) AND namesub = '-' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible FROM crudcate WHERE name = #{name} AND namesub != '-' AND visible = 'Y' AND namesubsub = '-' ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible FROM crudcate
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesubsub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY crudcateno ASC

SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible, r FROM ( SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT crudcateno, name, namesub, namesubsub, cnt, crudate, seqno, visible FROM crudcate
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesubsub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY crudcateno ASC ) )
WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM crudcate
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesubsub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY crudcateno ASC
